Package org.daisy.pipeline.event

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageStorage  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EventBusProvider  
    EventBusProvider_SPI  
    JobMonitorFactoryImpl  
    JobMonitorFactoryImpl_SPI  
    LiveMessageAccessor
    This class receives message events for a particular job, buffers them, makes them accessible through a MessageFilte.
    MessageAccessorFromStorage  
    MessageEventListener
    This class receives message events and forwards them to sub-listeners per job (LiveMessageAccessor instances).
    MessageEventListener_SPI  
    ProgressMessage
    A progress message is an extension of a simple message, with a certain "progress" and with possible nested (progress) messages.
    ProgressMessageBuilder  
    ProgressMessageUpdate
    Event for notifying that a job message that has been previously put on the event bus has been updated.
